info.+content: In a world of carnivores and herbivores, there is a lot of hope, love, and anxiety. Legoshi is a wolf who is a member of Cherryton Academy's drama club, and even though he's a wolf, he's very sensitive. (from manga)
TVアニメ「BEASTARS ビースターズ」
